ActJudges Act
SubjectJulia C. Bowser ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Claudius I.L. Leger **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to JULIA C. BOWSER, survivor of the Hon. Claudius I.L. Leger, a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of New Brunswick, Trial Division, effective September 5, 2014.
